last_episode_to_air.name: Seven Strike as One
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sunny, The Widow and Bajie lead the charge against Pilgrim, as he attempts to gain ultimate control of the Badlands; M.K. seeks revenge on The Widow. (Series Finale)

name: Into the Badlands
overview:
In a land controlled by feudal barons, a great warrior and a young boy embark on a journey across a dangerous land to find enlightenment. 

A genre-bending martial arts series very loosely based on the classic Chinese tale Journey to the West.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Season 3 finds Sunny living off the grid, doing his best to provide for his infant son, Henry. It is only when Henry contracts a mysterious illness that Sunny must join forces with Bajie and journey back into the Badlands, where the Widow and Baron Chau are entrenched in a drawn-out war that has destabilized the entire region.

episodes.name: The Fort
episodes.overview: The Badlands' deadliest Clipper rescues a mysterious boy with a dark secret, but who may know the way out.

episodes.name: Fist Like a Bullet
episodes.overview: M.K. finds refuge in an unlikely and dangerous place, while Sunny's loyalty is tested when Quinn tries to force him to commit an unspeakable act.

episodes.name: White Stork Spreads Wings
episodes.overview: As Sunny begins to train M.K., the boy struggles to learn discipline. Meanwhile, Quinn seeks retribution against The Widow and faces the consequences.

episodes.name: Two Tigers Subdue Dragons
episodes.overview: Sunny and M.K. try to figure out how to control the boy's power. Meanwhile, Quinn sets a dangerous parlay with a rival Baron to help fight The Widow.

episodes.name: Snake Creeps Down
episodes.overview: As Sunny secures his escape from the Fort, Quinn grows suspicious. Meanwhile, The Widow's decisions set her on a collision course with Sunny and M.K.

episodes.name: Hand of Five Poisons
episodes.overview: Sunny and M.K. fight to escape Quinn's grip once and for all. Meanwhile, the Baron's enemies conspire to take him down and change the Badlands forever.

episodes.name: Tiger Pushes Mountain
episodes.overview: Six months after the Season 1 finale, Sunny finds a new foe, as well as a new, unexpected ally, while MK learns about his gift in a mysterious place.

episodes.name: Force of Eagle's Claw
episodes.overview: Sunny and Bajie struggle to stay alive; the Widow consolidates her power in the face of challenges.

episodes.name: Red Sun, Silver Moon
episodes.overview: Sunny and Bajie meet a dangerous foe who knows Sunny; the Widow prepares for a showdown; MK learns a secret.

episodes.name: Palm of the Iron Fox
episodes.overview: The Widow's fight for power lands her in a showdown with her enemies, who have joined forces against her; an old threat resurfaces.

episodes.name: Monkey Leaps Through Mist
episodes.overview: Sunny and Bajie get help from an unlikely source, for a price; the Widow considers a risk; MK enacts a dangerous plan.

episodes.name: Leopard Stalks in Snow
episodes.overview: Sunny and Bajie meet a friend, but must also confront an enemy from their past; the Widow makes an unholy alliance.

episodes.name: Black Heart, White Mountain
episodes.overview: Sunny confronts his inner demons, and his friends try to help; the Widow exacts revenge on her enemies.

episodes.name: Sting of the Scorpion's Tail
episodes.overview: Sunny plays a game which causes his friends to question his loyalty; the Widow discovers the existence of a new weapon.

episodes.name: Nightingale Sings No More
episodes.overview: Sunny relies on an unlikely person for help in defeating a foe; Bajie learns a shocking secret from his past.

episodes.name: Wolf's Breath, Dragon Fire
episodes.overview: Sunny faces the toughest showdown of his life; Bajie's loyalties are tested to their limits.

episodes.name: Enter the Phoenix
episodes.overview: Sunny returns to the Badlands, seeking a cure for his son Henry. The Widow and Chau wage a bloody civil war. A new threat emerges.

episodes.name: Moon Rises, Raven Seeks
episodes.overview: Sunny and Bajie seek help from Lydia. The Widow struggles to control M.K. Pilgrim seeks to establish a new order in the Badlands.

episodes.name: Leopard Snares Rabbit
episodes.overview: Sunny and Bajie go undercover on The Widow's frontlines, seeking passage to a possible cure for Henry. Tilda confronts The Widow.

episodes.name: Blind Cannibal Assassins
episodes.overview: Sunny and Bajie face off against a deadly new foe with a dark connection to Sunny's past. Chau enlists her brother in the fight against Pilgrim.

episodes.name: Carry Tiger to Mountain
episodes.overview: Sunny and Bajie seek help from a reclusive former Master. The Widow must confront a spectre from her past as Chau's slave.

episodes.name: Black Wind Howls
episodes.overview: Sunny and Bajie call in a favor from Bajie's past. The Widow interrogates an important captive who threatens her tentative peace with Pilgrim.

episodes.name: Dragonfly's Last Dance
episodes.overview: Sunny works with the River King to secure passage to Pilgrim's Fortress. The Widow faces mutiny from discontented troops.

episodes.name: Leopard Catches Cloud
episodes.overview: Sunny and Bajie arrive at Pilgrim's Fortress, only to face an angry M.K. The Widow enlists Gaius. Moon and Lydia rally the troops.

episodes.name: Chamber of the Scorpion
episodes.overview: Sunny and Bajie face off with Pilgrim, who lays out his deadly plan for the Badlands.

episodes.name: Raven's Feather, Phoenix Blood
episodes.overview: Pilgrim leads the hunt for near-fatally wounded Sunny; The Widow confronts her inner demons in an attempt to restore her Gift.

episodes.name: The Boar and the Butterfly
episodes.overview: Sunny and Nix seek information that could destroy Pilgrim; The Widow and Bajie team up with the Master; M.K. leads Pilgrim to a great source of power.

episodes.name: Cobra Fang, Panther Claw
episodes.overview: The Widow and Baron Chau finally face off; M.K. and Pilgrim grow their forces at the Monastery; Sunny and Bajie discover a new foe, the Black Lotus.

episodes.name: Black Lotus, White Rose
episodes.overview: Sunny discovers an important figure from his past is working with the Black Lotus. The Widow, Gaius, and Tilda bring an end to the bloody civil war.

episodes.name: Curse of the Red Rain
episodes.overview: Sunny, Bajie and Kannin journey back into the Badlands. The Widow makes a risky play against Pilgrim, bringing Cressida and Lydia into the crossfire.

episodes.name: Requiem for the Fallen
episodes.overview: Sunny, Bajie and Gaius seek out an unlikely ally in the fight against Pilgrim. Cressida has a disturbing revelation. The Widow questions her future.

episodes.name: Seven Strike as One
episodes.overview: Sunny, The Widow and Bajie lead the charge against Pilgrim, as he attempts to gain ultimate control of the Badlands; M.K. seeks revenge on The Widow. (Series Finale)

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Season 3 finds Sunny living off the grid, doing his best to provide for his infant son, Henry. It is only when Henry contracts a mysterious illness that Sunny must join forces with Bajie and journey back into the Badlands, where the Widow and Baron Chau are entrenched in a drawn-out war that has destabilized the entire region.
